description.value:
Grants +20 to command Daemons. During combat as a Full Action any that are sanctified against Chaos that hear its sound (such as Priests, Grey Knights, Sisters of Battle, etc) to make an Opposed -10 Willpower Test vs Character's Willpower. If they fail they suffer a level of Fatigue.

Requirements

Doesn't have to be an actual horn, taking the form of Decaying Nurgle Bells or Great War Drums of Khorne, etc. Heretical.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
